item.description:
December 6, 2009


HI!

Just a reminder of our upcoming interfaith bookclub gathering...

I hope this note of mine finds you well, with peace and joy in your heart. Winter is finally here. Yesterday we had our first real snow storm, and given that I am still under the weather... I did not have the chance to enjoy it too much...

Life continue to be hectic at times, but God is good. Overall I cannot complain. I am really looking forward to seeing you on December 13, at 4:00PM...

So, mark your calendar:

TIME: December 13, 2009 at 4:00PM
PLACE: PEACE ABBEY - Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA 01770

We continue our reflection on MATTHEW FOX's book: "ONE RIVER, MANY WELLS". CHAPTER FOUR: "RELATING TO THE FUTURE, WHAT THE DEVINE IS ASKING OF US" (377-421). Just to let you know, that we have already chosen our next reading material: "The Inner Experience: Notes on Contemplation" by Thomas Merton.

We contionue to be enriched by the presence of each other... by our common sharing and reflection.

I hope to see you all on Sunday - December 13, at 4:00PM.

Blessings on you and your family and may heaven enable us to be bridge builders rather than obstable makers...

PEACE
Fr. Joe, sx
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries
(508) 429-2144
pino.ma@gmail.com
item.name: INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB
